long_desc.thetext:
Attached is a unified diff of various small changes to the /doc directory of the imapd distribution, including updates to broken links, and miscellaneous fixes.
3 links still need to be fixed, in doc/install-murder.html:
http://cyrusimap.web.cmu.edu/ag.html (twice) http://cyrusimap.web.cmu.edu/archives/mupdate.html
I haven't been able to locate their new location on http://cyrusimap.org yet.
The size of the patch is a bit deceptive since I passed '-U 10' to diff. The patch was generated from a CVS copy (9/3/2010).
Created an attachment (id=1302) Documentation patch against /doc for imapd

Created an attachment (id=1303) Fixed patch.
I failed to close a couple of TT tags in the first patch. Please disregard. This patch corrects those omissions.
Find attached my version of patches against 2.3.16 and 2.4.4 which change the links to the new website in README*, imap/version.c and doc/*.
Created an attachment (id=1325) URL updates for 2.3.16
Created an attachment (id=1326) URL updates for 2.4.4
